name: Heal Up
description:
A Small Survival Action Adventure Story Horror Game Made By INSANE GAMES

In Which You Have To Kill The Robotic Medboxes,Scissors And Spinners

Story:

You Woke In A Futuristic Hospital and you realized That The Robotic Medboxes Are Acting Weird. As You Know They Need A Red Liquid To Survive. You Feel Dizzy , and You Realize That The Medboxes Are Tring To Kill The Humans So They Developed A disease To Kill The Humans. Your Mission Is To Stop The Medboxes And Find The Medicine To Cure The Disease . The RNHR Medicine

Tips:

You Can Use The Medicines Droped By The Medboxes When They Are Died

Don't Forget To Reload!

Have An Eye On Health and The Disease Meter
